name: Blups
description:
Blups is a casual, short and funny 2d game in which a new minigame appears to be played every 10 seconds.

You can play the demo either in this webpage or you can download it below.

This game has been developed entirely by Pablo Lario Gómez. He is a 21 years old (2022) spanish student of Computer Science, and he hopes to be able to work in the videogame industry sometime in the future.

Controls:

- Windows & Browser: WASD

- Android: Rotate the mobile phone
